attachments.title: Sun & Moon on LinkedIn: "Good news! We've got some new dates for our Toon Boom, Adobe After Effects and Animate four day intensive courses running in November:clinking_glasses: Toon Boom starting on Monday 04th, After Effects 11th and Animate on the 18th :date:  Check them all out on the courses link in our bio and get signing up! :star-struck:  #bristol #sunandmoonstudios #animationstudio #work #animation #learn #toonboom #adobe #backtoschool #eventbrite "
